# Determine output of vector problems completed by hand
``` {r include=TRUE}
# Create namespace for vectors
vector_a <- c(1, 6)
vector_b <- c(2, 4)

# Addition
vector_a + vector_b

# Subtraction
vector_b - vector_a

# Scalar multiplication
4 * vector_a

# Dot product
vector_a * vector_b

```
